Changelog and Versioning¶

Version numbers¶

Version numbers follow this scheme:

<major>.<minor>.<maintenance>-<bugfix>

  • A major release contains big changes in the framework’s structure and delivers

breaking changes. - A minor release introduces new features, (minor) API changes are possible. - A maintenance release may deliver new features, bugfixes, performance improvements, but it won’t break your code, but minor regressions may occur in rare cases. - A bugfix release contains bugfixes only, no API changes are made at all.

Changelog¶

v1.2.0¶

  • first public release
